TEXT: The result of a foolish experiment to harness the powers of the Ancients. NL Uses its mutant powers to fuel its primal rage.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~mutated~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

~#pSILENCE.~ NL NL Then... thousands of needles scraping against you. Bones crack and blood pours by the gallons. Fluid drained and replenished, boiling, searing you from the inside out. Eyes burst, regrow, removed, never optimal enough, never perfect. You’ve been brought to the brink of death and back so many times that you are no longer afraid. You’ve seen what happens, and it’s better than this. NL NL The pain stops for a moment. Something is happening. Fire and brimstone erupt around you. The ones who subjected you to a lifetime of torture have fled, their implements scattered across the floor.  NL NL Your shackles are broken. You are angry, hungry, and most of all, afraid. NL NL You hear your mother's voice...
